description.value:
Can withstand armour-punching fragments to keep eyes safe. Diminishes high intensity bursts of light.

Requirements

No official rules. HB: +1 AP to head (doesn't stack with head armour) and +10 to save against bright flashes.

Effect: Common

Notes: -
description.summary: Can withstand armour-punching fragments to keep eyes safe. Diminishes high intensity bursts of light.
